name: It's Dark (mckare23)
description:
PLEASE CLICK FULLSCREEN IF THE GAME DOES NOT FIT YOUR SCREEN

This is a game made for Global Game Jam 2021 with the theme of "Lost & Found". The objective of the game is to retrieve an emerald in a room covered with total darkness. Use the flashlight to navigate and beware of the enemies. 

Controls:

Movement: W,A,S,D

Flashlight: Hold Left Mouse Click

This game is produced by three people: 

Development: M. Ceyhun Kardas

Game Design: Ege Basturk & Orhan Veli Cetin

Art assets in the game are taken from free to use assets made and published by Kenney.nl.

Contact: cekardas@gmail.com
